title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly, Peter Navarro, & Dave Rubin | 10/29/21
description:
Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss the news of the week, including President Biden’s failure to push his policies through, the government's ability to mandate the COVID vaccine, and Biden’s disdain for the opposite side. Peter Navarro, former assistant to President Trump, joins Glenn to discuss the state of the economy and his confrontations with Dr. Fauci. BlazeTV host Dave Rubin joins to discuss a gay magazine canceling a profile of him due to politics. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
